title: Sujood Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Sujood Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 41
items.translation: How perfect my Lord is, The Most High.’(three times)

items.title: Dua 42
items.arabic: ((سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ، اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي)).
items.transliteration: Subhanakal-lahumma rabbana wabihamdik, allahummagh- fir lee.
items.translation: How perfect You are O Allah, our Lord, and I praise You. O Allah, forgive me.

items.title: Dua 43
items.translation: Perfect and Holy (He is), Lord of the angles and the Rooh (i.e. Jibra-eel).

items.title: Dua 44
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ سَجَدْتُ وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ، وَلَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ، سَجَدَ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِي خَلَقَهُ، وَصَوَّرَهُ، وَشَقَّ سَمْعَهُ وَبَصَرَهُ، تَبَارَكَ اللَّهُ أَحْسنُ الْخَالِقينَ)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma laka sajadt, wabika amant, walaka aslamt, sajada wajhee lillathee khalaqahu wasawwarahu washaqqa samAAahu wabasarahu, tabarakal-lahu ahsanul-khaliqeen.
items.translation: O Allah, unto You I have prostrated and in You I have believed, and unto You I have submitted. My face has prostrated before He Who created it and fashioned it, and brought forth its faculties of hearing and seeing. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.

items.title: Dua 45
items.translation: How perfect He is, The Possessor of total power, sovereignty, magnificence and grandeur.

items.title: Dua 46
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ: دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ، وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ، وَعَلاَنِيَّتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ)).
items.transliteration: Allahummagh-fir lee thanbee kullah, diqqahu wajillah, wa-awwalahu wa-akhirah, wa- AAalaniyyatahu wa-sirrah.
items.translation: O Allah, forgive me all of my sins, the small and great of them, the first and last of them, and the seen and hidden of them.

items.title: Dua 47
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِرِضَاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ، وَبِمُعَافَاتِكَ مِنْ عُقوبَتِكَ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْكَ، لاَ أُحْصِي ثَنَاءً عَلَيْكَ، أَنْتَ كَمَا أَثْنَيْتَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ)).
items.transliteration: Allahumma innee aAAoothu biridaka min sakhatik, wa-bimuAAafatika min AAuqoobatik, wa-aAAoothu bika mink, la ohsee thana-an AAalayk, anta kama athnayta AAala nafsik.
items.translation: O Allah, I take refuge within Your pleasure from Your displeasure and within Your pardon from Your punishment, and I take refuge in You from You. I cannot enumerate Your praise, You are as You have praised Yourself.
